title: 22 celebrities you probably forgot appeared on 'Baywatch'
text:
Mila Kunis, Jason Momoa, and Sofia Vergara appeared on "Baywatch." Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images for dcp; Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP; Evan Agostini/Invision/AP

"Baywatch" premiered on NBC in 1989 and lasted for more 11 seasons before ending in 2001.

The hit show, which made red swimsuits and running on the beach in slow motion pop-culture staples, also inspired a 2017 film that starred Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson and Zac Efron.

Many well-known actors and even A-list stars, like Mila Kunis and Jason Momoa, got small (or in some cases, big) roles on "Baywatch" before they became known for something else entirely.

Here are all the stars you probably didn't know were on "Baywatch."

Carrie Wittmer contributed to a previous version of this article.
description: So many famous people were on the popular beach lifeguard drama back in the 1990s, including an Oscar nominee and an Emmy winner.
